  2. Will artificial intelligence boost productivity? Companies sure hope so  The Seattle Times
  3. AI and Productivity Growth: Evidence from Historical Developments in Other Technologies  Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis
  4. AI is pervasive. Here's when we'll see its real economic benefits materialize  Fortune
  5. Harness the productivity potential of GenAI  EY

item.title: Billie Eilish, Nicki Minaj, Jon Bon Jovi and over 200 artists call for protections against “predatory use of AI” - CNBC
item.description:
1. Billie Eilish, Nicki Minaj, Jon Bon Jovi and over 200 artists call for protections against “predatory use of AI”  CNBC
  2. “Some of the biggest and most powerful companies are, without permission, using our work to train AI models...This assault on human creativity must be stopped”: Pearl Jam, The Cure, R.E.M. attack “predatory” use of AI in music  Louder
  3. Billie Eilish, Pearl Jam, 200 artists say AI poses existential threat to their livelihoods  Ars Technica
  4. Jon Bon Jovi, Billie Eilish and more sign open letter protesting 'predatory use of AI'  ABC News
  5. Katy Perry, Billie Eilish, Miranda Lambert and More Sign Open Letter Against 'AI Music-Generation Technology'  PEOPLE

item.title: Nvidia plans to build a $200 million AI center in Indonesia amid push into Southeast Asia - CNBC
item.description:
1. Nvidia plans to build a $200 million AI center in Indonesia amid push into Southeast Asia  CNBC
  2. Nvidia, Indosat plan $200 mln AI centre investment in Indonesia, government says  Reuters
  3. Nvidia eyes Indonesia for $200M AI center amid global AI scramble  Cointelegraph
  4. Nvidia (NASDAQ:NVDA) Plans $200M AI Center in Indonesia - TipRanks.com  TipRanks
  5. Nvidia plans $200 million AI center in Indonesia  Quartz
